website_summaries.verdict: Choose this perfume if you like a vibrant, mysterious scent with a variety of notes. However, consider others on our list if you prefer a lighter scent.
pros: Combines fruity and floral notes with a hint of amber for a fragrance that can be described as sweet and bold
Rich scent is perfect for evening wear and for the winter and fall months
Just a few drops go a long way
cons: Somewhat strong when you first apply it, and it may take several hours to fade to a more subdued scent

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for the Holidays
customer_reviews.text: This parfum is great for all ages. I am 57 and it is absolutely one of my top five favorites and my daughter is 21 and she loves it as much as I do. It has very deep scents which probably makes it a better choice for night or evening, but I wear it to work during the day and at night. It does last all day as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Smells Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of compliments about this scent! Love the clean, fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Tindell

customer_reviews.title: Burberry is where its at! Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: This Burberry Black Perfume is semi-strong but after a little while tones down. Its a new scent for me and I love it. In line with the price of other designer scents. I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell I do think it’s a little small for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Teretha

customer_reviews.title: My go to Fall/Winter Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I've worn My Burberry Black for numerous years now and this fragrance is divine. Typically I wear it during the cooler Fall and cold Winter months and receive compliment after compliment. The fragrance itself is powerful at first, but dies down to a very soft warm scent that both men and women comment on...all good comments! I highly recommend trying this scent if you're on the fence, it is a very modern sophisicated scent that has all day staying power. Good for date nights as well. I'm a Hugh Chanel fan and My Burberry Black comes close in comparison to Coco Mademoiselle for me.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barnard

customer_reviews.title: The most gorgeous piece in the collection
customer_reviews.text: This perfume is literal perfection. From the beautiful bottle with its intricate details, to the scent and longevity of the perfume. I have received so many compliments already. The price asked for the perfume is worth it in every sense. This is a high quality fragrance in a big bottle with strong staying power and a beautiful scent.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh T

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about getting this product as I had heard great reviews on this perfume and was dying to try it as I read it had a long scent life, but to my surprise it hardly had a scent to it. It was very disappointing. Idk if it had been sitting for a long period or I got a bad batch but even my husband made the comment that he couldn’t smell it after only wearing for 10 min in the air conditioning so it wasn’t like u had sweat it off. I will not be purchasing as the value was not worth the money for not even 10 min worth of longevity of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Msfinn

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Its just superb. Years Ago I started using Burberry London, then they took off the London of the name. It has been the number one perfume for me for more than 20 years... until I ordered this one... its an OMG!! Last all day and then scent ! Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Smelt it, liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't need to smell before bought. 10/10 smells like my burberry black
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts ALL DAY!! AND INTO EVENING!!
customer_reviews.text: This, well, Burberry is my FAVORITE PERFUME, AND ONLY TRIED 2, BUT I AM ALMOST CERTAIN THEY ARE ALL AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: debsstuff

customer_reviews.title: travels well
customer_reviews.text: love love the smell. I like that it came in a travel size container that I can take with me when I travel without having to bring the large bottle. I have no complaints. the smell lasts for hours without having to re-apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Horrrible dont buy it has a smell of shower powder not worth the money im super sad
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for Burberry fans!
customer_reviews.text: I already have the My Burberry perfume. Just wanted to try the Black version. I just love this fragrance! It's a richer version of My Burberry.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lee Stone

customer_reviews.title: Roller Ball not functioning
customer_reviews.text: This is the correct product but the rollerball is barely functioning. I would like my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite perfume.
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. I'm normally an essential oils kind of girl, and love anything with amber. This isn't too sweet or floral like most women's perfumes but has a darker and more mysterious vibe. Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.text: came at the time excepted and looked exactly how the pictures shows. love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The best of the best perfume I ever had! Love it 😍
customer_reviews.author: zoan

customer_reviews.title: Wish it could have been my Scent!
customer_reviews.text: Like the scent at first but it fades to powdery to soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel size
customer_reviews.text: I like the small size so I can take it when traveling. Nice scent but very strong so a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Paula B.

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance and longevity.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fragrance, it lasts all day and everywhere I go people ask me “What fragrance are you wearing.”
customer_reviews.author: MollynMe

customer_reviews.title: Bad roller leaked perfume
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a month. Sitting on my bathroom counter. It leaked and all my parfum is gone. For an expensive perfume they made a faulty and bad roller. .
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Was xmas present for my Lady. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Renita Livingston

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing fragrance...i sray in the morning and you are good all day without having to reapply. This is how I think all fragrances should be for the money you spend on them... I liked this so much I might try another burberry fragrance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The jasmine/rose/peach fades quickly to a fairly heavy patchouli amber musky scent.  Scent lasts the entire day, easily.
customer_reviews.text: The flower/fruit scent (jasmine/rose/peach) fades quickly (within a half hour) to a fairly heavy patchouli amber musky scent which lasts for at least eight hours. I would not actually describe this as floral, it is a far deeper scent pretty quickly. It is a heavy darker fragrance after drying a bit. Might be a bit overwhelming for daytime use because of the intensity. A little goes a very long way. The bottle is just lovely and classic looking. Heavy glass with a tortoiseshell look cap. This bottle will last a long time. Photo with soda can for scale.
customer_reviews.author: Two kids mom

customer_reviews.title: Alluring and rich scent
customer_reviews.text: This perfume has a very rich and alluring scent. I felt like it was dark and and a bit musky, but my sister thought it was sweet. It's very strong, and I was only able to use one spray on my stomach, so it was under clothing and away from my face (due to headaches caused by heavy scents). Wearing it that way, I felt the perfume is noticeable without being overbearing to myself or others around me. I like the top notes of the perfume, but honestly prefer it after it has settled down to its bottom notes.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Parfum spray with hints of rose
customer_reviews.text: Rose, a hint of jasmine, peach undertones. Parfum changes person to person. It enhances differently to different skins, hormones, body scents. This is a lovely parfum that enhances. A tiny spray is perfect at the pulse points. Love the bottle and it is a perfect gift. A touching bit of romance wether in a new relationship, long time loves, or simply amazing friends this is a true gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Jo

customer_reviews.title: musky rose
customer_reviews.text: LIKE MOST: The scent is not too strong or too floral as I thought it was going to be. It is a musky rose scent which I really like. I did not find that it made me sneeze either. It has a underlying freshness to it. I would wear this and the price is not bad either. I think this bottle that I received will last me quite awhile because I only needed to spray it twice and then go. It lasted a long time. LIKE LEAST: nothing
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This was given to me as a gift from a family member. The first day I wore it, four people made comments about how wonderful it is. They are right. This stuff smells great!!!
customer_reviews.author: RedHeadEd

customer_reviews.title: A classy scent with a light musky undertone.
customer_reviews.text: A classy scent with a light musky undertone. My only complaint is the bulky top and shape. This parfum settled quickly into a light scent that despite its dark undertones, was not over powering. I recommend this for an adventurous night out. .
customer_reviews.author: Curious One

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed by this perfume. It has a pleasant scent of jasmine - but that's all. There are other, far less expensive perfumes that smell exactly like this one. It lacked staying power as well; I had to touch it up after just one hour. The best that I can say about My Burberry Black is that it's pleasant - but there's nothing new or different about it.
customer_reviews.author: fruitloopTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great scent that lasts.
customer_reviews.text: This smells wonderful. It is wrapped beautifully and the scent lasts. I got several compliments the first day I wore it. The bottle is bulky for taking with you but it is otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this perfume. It is woodsy and is also very long lasting. I put it on in the morning and still noticed it off and on in the late afternoon. It comes in an attractive bottle and is easy to apply. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Fegler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed by this perfume. It has a pleasant scent of jasmine - but that's all. There are other, far less expensive perfumes that smell exactly like this one. It lacked staying power as well; I had to touch it up after just one hour. The best that I can say about My Burberry Black is that it's pleasant - but there's nothing new or different about it.
customer_reviews.author: fruitloopTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: This one is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This fragrance is complex and lasts all day. It has a hint of floral, but a heavier musk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he really loved it
customer_reviews.author: Wenifred Benis

product_meta.title: BURBERRY My BURBERRY Black Parfum, 1.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
My Burberry Black. A new fragrance joining the My Burberry collection, it follows the same codes of craftsmanship, innovation and appreciation of the iconic Heritage Trench Coat. My Burberry Black travels back to a London garden amidst a gathering storm, heavy rain contrasting with the warm and captivating flora. Fusing the scent of sun-drenched jasmine flower and peach nectar with a sensual touch of rose. The iconic rose note at the heart of My Burberry fragrances, is given a sweet and inviting candied twist, while rich amber patchouli rounds off the scent, for a deep and captivating finish.

BRAND STORY
British. Effortless. Runway Inspired. That's Burberry’s beauty philosophy.
